content: परी(परि-इ) {c2c} <ab>P.</ab> {@--1@} To go round, circumambulate; (चरणन्यासं) भक्तिनम्रः परीयाः <ls>Me. 55</ls>; <ls>Ms. 2. 48.</ls> {@--2@} To surround, encompass; हुतवहपरीतं गृहमिव <ls>Ś. 5. 10</ls>; विषवल्लीभिः परीताभिर्महौषधिः <ls>R. 12. 61</ls>; so कोपपरीतमानसं <ls>Ki. 2. 25.</ls> {@--3@} To go to, think of (objects &c.). {@--4@} To be changed or transformed. {@--5@} To reach to. {@--6@} To run against.
